amendment.description: To set aside an amount for small business development and transition.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3545 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3545 proposed by Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S7383; text: CR S7383) To set aside an amount for small business development and transition.
